selectedVerses.text: So they laid it aside till the morning, as Moses commanded them, and it did not stink, and there were no worms in it.
Immediately an angel of the Lord struck him down, because he did not give God the glory, and he was eaten by worms and breathed his last.
My flesh is clothed with worms and dirt; my skin hardens, then breaks out afresh.
They lie down alike in the dust, and the worms cover them.
Your pomp is brought down to Sheol, the sound of your harps; maggots are laid as a bed beneath you, and worms are your covers.
